headline: Barclays Analyst Bullish on Iron Mountain Incorporated (IRM)
summary: Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE:IRM) is one of the best dividend stocks in the real estate sector. On November 20, Brendan Lynch from Barclays kept a Buy rating on Iron Mountain, along with a target price of $123. Independent of the analyst action, a Reuters report dated November 19 revealed that the short-selling hedge fund duo, […]

headline: A Fresh Look at Iron Mountain (IRM) Valuation as Expert Opinions Diverge on Growth and Value Potential
summary: Iron Mountain (IRM) stock is getting fresh attention as expert opinions diverge. Jim Cramer suggests investors approach with caution, while Baron Real Estate Fund has initiated a new position, highlighting value and long-term prospects. See our latest analysis for Iron Mountain. Iron Mountain’s share price has come under pressure lately, with a 1-day return of -4.08% and a steep 30-day share price return of -19.54%, following a year-to-date drop of nearly 21%.
